pages.title: Temporal Accelerator
pages.text: The <item>Temporal Accelerator/$ is a machine that speeds up time in a 5x5x5 area. It can affect blocks, entities, or both. It consumes a <thing>$(l:essentials:beam/time)time beam/$ and produces <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ as a byproduct.$(br2)While holding a <item>$(l:essentials/wrench)wrench/$, the affected 5x5x5 area will be highlighted. Right-clicking

the <item>temporal accelerator/$ will rotate it, and shift-right-clicking will change the mode between affecting only entities, only blocks, or both.$(br2)The <item>temporal accelerator/$ accepts a <thing>$(l:essentials:beam/time)time beam/$ in the back. It will speed up time in the affected area by (<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam power/$)/4 extra ticks per tick (or (<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam power/$)*25%). While boosting time, <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy

<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)/$ is produced- the amount produced grows exponentially with the applied boost- producing (2^(extra ticks)) * 2 <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ per cycle (aka: +100% boost is 4TEn/cycle, +200% boost is 8TEn/cycle, +300% is 16TEn/cycle, etc.).$(br2)Multiple overlapping <item>temporal accelerators/$ stack additively. The <item>temporal accelerator/$ itself can not be time-accelerated.

The <item>Distributed Temporal Accelerator/$ is a larger-range version of the <item>Temporal Accelerator/$ that affects every tile entity in the entire chunk it is placed in. It <em>only affects tile entities/$, it does not apply to block ticks or entities.$(br2)It requires a stronger

<thing>$(l:essentials:beam/time)time beam/$ and produces more <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ than the normal <item>temporal accelerator/$, but is more efficient in terms of beam usage/entropy creation per block affected.$(br2)It uses a <thing>$(l:essentials:beam/time)time beam/$ to create (<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam power/$)/16 extra ticks per tick (or (<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam power/$)*12.5%). It produces (2^(extra ticks)) * 8 <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ per cycle (aka: +100% boost is

16TEn/cycle, +200% boost is 32TEn/cycle, +300% is 64TEn/cycle)$(br2)Multiple overlapping <item>distributed temporal accelerators/$ stack additively. The <item>distributed temporal accelerator/$ itself can not be time-accelerated.$(br2)
